description: Verify to upload file above 4MB size and verify alert box pop up

steps.name: Click MyRequest of side nav bar
Click edit button from MyRequest Section tables
Click Upload Attachment button to upload file : C:\Users\hi\eclipse-workspace\Alumni-portal\test-data\InvalidFile.pdf
